products.name: Spiced Cinnamon
products.desc: Cinnamon & Apple Flavored Coffee has the sweet and spicy aroma and flavor of Cinnamon that will delight your palate and senses.
reviews: We love the aroma that fills the room whenever we pour a cup. 11/10 would recommend!
Could use some more apple flavours, cinnamon can be a bit overwhelming.

products.name: Breakfast Blend
products.desc: This is truly a 'wake-up' cup of coffee. A mixture of Central and South American coffee, this blend leaves a long, balanced aftertaste and the desire for a second morning cup.
reviews: I love taking this blend with me on the road. Keeps me focussed.

products.name: Butter Rum
products.desc: With hints of warm vanilla and butterscotch, this alcohol-free coffee makes a beautifully balanced, aromatic cup of Butter Rum Flavored Coffee.
reviews: Weird combo at first but we all love it now.

products.name: Pacific Dark
products.desc: This roast has been pushed to its limits. Roasted to its full potential to give a rich dark flavor that is simply unmatched. This roast requires perfect precision to keep the best of the coffees original characteristics and flavors for you enjoyment.
reviews: We love the aroma that fills the room whenever we pour a cup. 11/10 would recommend!

products.name: Blend Classic
products.desc: A soft, smooth blend with fragrant nuttiness and sweet taste.

products.name: Espresso Perfecto
products.desc: A hard unforgiving punch in the face. Perfect for waking up, Italian style.

products_nl.name: Kaneel & Appel
products_nl.desc: Koffie met kaneel en appel heeft een zoete en kruidige geur die uw smaakpapillen en zintuigen zal verrukken.

products_nl.name: Wake n Coffee
products_nl.desc: Met een mengeling van Centraal- en Zuid-Amerikaanse bonen is dit een echte 'wake-up' koffie. Het heeft een zachte smaak met een bittere toets.

products_nl.name: Toffee Rum
products_nl.taste: Een mix van vanille en toffee
products_nl.desc: Met hints van warme vanille en butterscotch krijgt deze alcoholvrije koffie een prachtige uitgebalanceerde e en aromatische smaak.

products_nl.name: Pacific Dark
products_nl.desc: This roast has been pushed to its limits. Roasted to its full potential to give a rich dark flavor that is simply unmatched. This roast requires perfect precision to keep the best of the coffees original characteristics and flavors for you enjoyment.
